title: soppana vAzhvil
sahitya:
soppana vAzhvil magizhndu subramaNya svAmi unnai marandAr andO
 arppa paNappEi piDittE arivizhandu arpargaLaip-pugazhvAr
				jOnpuri


caraNam 1    nAvAl poi mozhivAr poruL virumbi nAvAl poi mozhivAr tanadu vAzh nALellAm pAzh sheivAr undan pAvana nAmamadai oru pozhudum bhAvanai sheidariyAr
				Vijayanagari
  caraNam 2   andO vinadi idE arindarindu Azh narakil uzhalvArE (mAndar) ivar cintai tirundi uyya guhanE undan tiruvaruL puriyAyO
